statements: UPDATE multimedia_data SET description='New description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE multimedia_data SET video_url='new_video_url' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE multimedia_data SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE multimedia_data SET image_url = 'new_image.jpg', video_url = 'new_video.mp4' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE multimedia_data SET description = 'New description for multimedia data' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE analysis_results SET result = 'Updated analysis result' WHERE data_id = 2
UPDATE multimedia_data SET image_url = 'new_image_url', description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE analysis_results SET result = 'New analysis result' WHERE data_id = 2 AND analysis_type = 'image';
UPDATE images SET image_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET organization = 'New Organization', field_of_study = 'New Field' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE images SET image_description = 'Updated description', upload_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE videos SET description = 'New video description', video_title = 'Updated Title', upload_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE images SET caption = 'Updated caption' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE videos SET duration = '00:05:30' WHERE video_id = 2;
UPDATE images SET caption = 'Beautiful landscape image' WHERE image_id = 12345;
UPDATE videos SET uploaded_by = 'John Doe', duration = '00:15:30' WHERE video_id = 54321;
UPDATE images SET image_description = 'Updated description' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE videos SET video_resolution = '1080p', video_length = INTERVAL '1 hour' WHERE video_id = 2;
UPDATE images SET image_description = 'New Description' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE video_metadata SET metadata_value = '720p' WHERE video_id = 2 AND metadata_key = 'resolution';
